channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Are prices going up because of tariffs? Here's what we know
item.description: Prices have risen a tad on some items especially affected by tariffs. But for the most part, companies are finding ways to delay price increases — for...

item.title: Trump lawsuit against Murdoch and 'Wall Street Journal' turns personal
item.description: Trump says he personally told his "very good friend Rupert Murdoch" that he had not sent a racy birthday greeting two decades ago to Jeffrey Epstein. ...

item.title: 'Worst-case scenario of famine' unfolding in Gaza, warns U.N.-backed report
item.description: A U.N.-backed food security group says famine is unfolding in Gaza, with thousands of children malnourished and hunger-related deaths rising.

item.title: How a friend's overdose drove a leading addiction scientist to look for answers
item.description: After Nabarun Dasgupta lost a close friend to an overdose, he dedicated himself to addiction research and trying to empower drug users with lifesaving...

item.title: NYC shooter who killed 4 identified. And, Gaza faces dire levels of hunger
item.description: Authorities have identified a gunman who opened fire inside a Manhattan office building yesterday, killing four people. And, Gaza is only receiving a ...

item.title: What to know about the shooting at a New York City office tower that killed 4

item.description: Returning home as African champions, the president thanked the players for their inspiration.

item.title: 7/29: CBS Morning News
item.description: Gunman kills four inside Manhattan office building; Deion Sanders reveals bladder cancer diagnosis but says he's now "cancer-free."

item.title: Police officer among four dead in shooting at New York City office building
item.description: Authorities say Shane Devon Tamura travelled across the country from Las Vegas to open fire inside the skyscraper.

item.title: Russian strikes kill 25 as prison and hospital hit, Ukraine says
item.description: The deadly Russian air strikes come as US President Donald Trump toughens truce ultimatum to Russia.

item.title: Gunman in NYC office shooting tried to target NFL, mayor says
item.description: Shane Tamura, the shooter behind the deadly rampage in Midtown Manhattan,​ was apparently targeting NFL offices, NYC Mayor Eric Adams says.

item.title: BBC visits Beijing region hit by deadly flood
item.description: The BBC's Stephen McDonell is in Miyun, one of the areas hardest-hit by the severe weather.

item.title: Hundreds of arrests during deadly Angola fuel protests
item.description: "People are fed up, hunger is rife," activists tell the BBC as thousands join protests in Luanda.

item.title: Shooter opens fire outside Reno casino, killing 3 and injuring several others
